450357745082826752.text: @thewhyaxis I think we are in a unique moment where something new is happening, and the best hacks of our generation making it happen
450357745082826752.name: mrejfox

450357521266790401.text: @thewhyaxis good question. Right now, I really want the journalists at @firstlook create beautiful stories, and tools to do data journalism
450357521266790401.name: mrejfox

450354735280033794.text: I want to work long hours to get something really important into the world. those are the moments I am happiest ( if I can rest after )
450354735280033794.name: mrejfox

450352758257119232.text: I want to Just Do It and not wait for approval, or for anyone to ask. But I also want to do things that are important to other people.
450352758257119232.name: mrejfox

450352562789548032.text: I want a mission. A goal. A company to build. A product to make successful. A dataset to explore. A story to unravel. A team to learn from.
450352562789548032.name: mrejfox

450352266420428800.text: I want to turn out some great stories. Stories people re-read. Stories people force their friends to read, watch, or listen to.
450352266420428800.name: mrejfox

450351521545613312.text: I want to always be making tools, so that everything I learn and accomplish is made easier and more accessible to those that follow.
450351521545613312.name: mrejfox

450351321162727424.text: I want to do things in ways that have never been done before. I want to try things for the first time that become industry standard later.
450351321162727424.name: mrejfox

450351099850272768.text: I want to help my friends accomplish amazing things. I want to help them do everything they want to do, so I can learn alongside them.
450351099850272768.name: mrejfox

450350850037514240.text: I want to wake up in the morning and spend my day talking to people way, way smarter than me. I want to keep getting surprised by new things
450350850037514240.name: mrejfox

450350667170082816.text: I want to make things better. I want to do everything I can so Dan Siegel can be mayor. So kids can learn to program.
450350667170082816.name: mrejfox

450350209810591744.text: I want to be part of a community, and help it. I love Oakland for this. I love the community there. So many people working together.
450350209810591744.name: mrejfox

450349962459897856.text: I want to change the world. The most appealing way to do that is journalism. I want to tell truths so beautifully they cant be ignored.
450349962459897856.name: mrejfox

450349426310393857.text: This morning I woke up in a bit of a malaise. Trying to figure out what I want. Trying to make some plans.
450349426310393857.name: mrejfox
